content: big chunky comfy hat by erica kempf broughton materials 1 skein malabrigo rasta 90 yards super bulky yarn 1 set of us size 11 needles 16 inch circular or dpn size one size and super stretchy gauge 4 1/2 sts in 2 inches in k2 p1 ribbing stitch dictionary p2 k1 ribbing row 1 p2 k1 repeat to end of row repeat row 1 k2 p1 ribbing row 1 k2 p1 repeat to end of row repeat row 1 k2tog knit two stitches together work even in pattern don t increase or decrease knit the knit stitches and purl the purl stitches this is a good opportunity to learn to read your knitting if the stitch you re about to work looks like a v on your needle knit it if it looks like a bump n then purl it instructions cast on 48 stitches join in the round being careful not to twist your stitches place a stitch marker to mark the beginning of the round work 8 rounds in p2 k1 ribbing work 15 rounds in k2 p1 ribbing your hat should now measure about 6 inches from cast on edge if it is shorter than 6 inches or you prefer longer hats continue in pattern until desired length begin decrease rounds round 1 k2 p1 k2 p1 k2tog p1 repeat a total of 5 times k2 p1 43 stitches remain round 2 and all even rounds work even in pattern round 3 k2tog p1 k2 p1 k1 p1 repeat a total of 5 times k2tog p1 37 stitches remain round 5 k1 p1 k2tog p1 k1 p1 repeat a total of 5 times k1 p1 32 stitches remain round 7 k2tog p2tog repeat to end of round 16 stitches remain round 9 repeat round 7 8 stitches remain cut your yarn leaving at least an 8 inch tail pull this tail through all of the stitches left on your needle and pull it tight cinching up your hat to close it pull tail through a second time for added security and weave in ends no need to block just wear with pride
